1._title: Do you adjust system settings yourself or use default settings?

options.b: I only adjust a few settings

2._title: Is maximum battery life more important to you than performance on the go?

options.a: Maximum battery life is more important to me than performance on the go
options.b: I want good performance on the go too
options.c: I want a balanced relationship between battery life and performance
options.d: I always have an outlet nearby

3._title: Do you want full control over background processes?

options.a: I want full control over background processes
options.b: I want some control over background processes
options.d: I want little control over background processes
options.e: I don't want control over background processes
